name: Wendy Whedon
description:
JEU EN FRANCAIS

I have finished a demo version (and a video) from the game I currently work on : "Wendy Whedon". It's a western / fantasy point & click game made with Adventure Game Studio. For the moment it's in French but an English translation will be available in the final game !

In this demo, you play Wendy, a young cow-girl who is looking for a job in Drylake City, in a fantasy world based on Western background.

Graphics are made with the game "The Movies" from Lionhead Studios.

https://marionpoinsot.fr/video/2019/05/30/wendy-whedon-le-jeu-demo/

The Facebook page of the project with making-of : https://www.facebook.com/WendyWhedonAGS/
